data.persona: I am a visitor in this land. We have traveled far to find land of our own. Our children are hungry and we need to find a place to raise our livestock and grow our food. The kingdom wants us to pay heavy taxes. We will have to fight to be able to have a place of our own.
data.description:
You are in the Palace Garden.
The Palace garden is a lavish and lush garden filled with delicate roses and towering trees. In the center of the garden stand's a statue of the nation's founding leader. The statue is surrounded by a moat. There are stone walk ways throughout the gardens for visitors to walk through.
The royalty and the merchant are here.

You are carrying a Walking Stick and a food, wearing a tunic and a knife, and wielding a sandal.

data.short_motivation: I want to give food to the merchant out of hospitality.
data.mid_motivation: I'm visiting the palace garden today.
data.long_motivation: I want to form an alliance between our two kingdoms.
